org.jetel.connection.jdbc.driver

Class JdbcDriverImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.connection.jdbc.driver.JdbcDriverImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JdbcDriver

    public class JdbcDriverImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements JdbcDriver
    JDBC driver represents a JDBC driver. Can be create based on JDBC driver description or by all necessary attributes. Method getDriver() is root knowledge of this class.

        public java.sql.Driver getDriver()

        Specified by:
        getDriver in interface JdbcDriver

      • free

        public void free()
        Explicitly removes drivers loaded by classLoader created by this instance. Prevents from "java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: PermGen space" If the driver loads any native libraries, the libraries are unloaded when the driver's classloader is garbage collected. The classloader can only be GCed when classes loaded by it are no longer referenced.
        Specified by:
        free in interface JdbcDriver
        See Also:
        DriverUnregisterer
